name: Holiday Heist (Nancy Dor)
description:
Twas the night before chrismtas

A busy night at the shop One naughty elf Was given the chop

“You cant fire me Santa! I’m your best worker here!” “I know”… he thought…. “I’ll make it all clear”

“What can I do to get back at this man? Take all his presents as FAST as I can”

Your mission is steal Santa gifts and give them back to your fellow working elf's, take as many presents as you can and escape the Jolly Red Man.

Created by Team Gigi's moving castle

Nancy Dor and Lucy Bradbury: (Blueprinting)

Tilly Brice and Spencer Lancaster: (Concept Art)

Bethany Stacey and Iuliia Rozsa-Bakacsi: (3D Assets)

Created for NUA 2020 November Games Jam
